room_title: Escape room "Family Secrets" by Key and Code Escape Rooms in Reno
room_address: 1420 Scheels Drive Suite E-108 Sparks, NV 89434
room_description:
Your family owns a drug company which has developed an experimental drug and could be the cure for Alzheimer’s the world has been looking for. In order to avoid government red tape, your family has decided to force your grandfather to be the “clinical trial” subject.
You’ve noticed that your grandpa is no longer forgetful, but instead, he’s been acting deranged and vengeful. He’s become obsessed with cults, spiritual experiences, end of days and even once slipped to mention “family sacrifice”. You are concerned that maybe your family has gone too far with the trial and it’s your turn to check on him, but when you arrive he takes you captive!
Handcuffed and locked in a dark room with the temperature rising, you must escape in 60 minutes before Grandpa returns to make you his sacrificial offering.
